The `Floor` class generates a floor plan with randomly placed rooms and sets a random room with neighboring rooms as the current room.

The FloorTile class extends the Tile class and represents a non-solid floor tile.

The Game class is a Java implementation of a game loop with methods for initializing, starting, stopping, updating, and drawing the game.

The Map class is a singleton that contains a Floor object and methods for updating and drawing the tiles on the floor.

PlayState
The PlayState class initializes a hero and a main menu, updates and draws them based on whether the game has started or not.
